content: the dress is suitable for a small stuffed toy or a doll my toys are about 13cm ears not included you can modify the pattern a bit to change the size materials & tools -yarnart jeans 50g/160m 174yds 2 colors -1 60mm hook -scissors -sewing needle -button if you want to crochet a similar bunny the pattern will be available on ravelry and etsy as well happy crocheting
